text_block_list.text:
As I was walking along the riverside 
path on a clear and sunny afternoon――

text_block_list.name: A Lively Voice
text_block_list.text:
Wait for meーーー!! 
Hahahaa Ahahaha!

text_block_list.name: A Familiar Voice
text_block_list.text: Fufu, try and catch me!

When I heard those voices, I turned to see that it was Cesario 
running joyfully with a young girl. As I looked closer, I could 
see the girl had the ears and tail of an Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, tag was fun, wasn't it? What should we play next?

text_block_list.name: Young Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Ummmm-……Follow the leader! 
And after that a relay and a marathon too!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Geez……fufuu, you really like that, huh? 
Okay, let's do it all!

text_block_list.name: Young Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan, thank you! Let's play again, okay～!?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Another time. …………Fuuu.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Eh? Oh, from the other day……! 
Good afternoon. Are you taking a walk?
choice_data_list: Kind of. Is she someone you know?
Kind of. Is she someone you know?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
No, I just met her. While I was out running, I happened 
to come across an exhausted man and when I talked to him……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
It seems like he was worn out from playing with his daughter. 
『Can you play with her for me?』 is what he asked me.

Even if they were just a child, Uma Musume 
and their stamina, legs, and speed are quite 
incredible. It's not surprising he was worn out.

It sounded like that girl usually ran around 
with her mother, but she had caught a cold so 
the father was left alone to look after the girl.
choice_data_list: He must have been really thankful

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, for sure. Once that girl started running, 
she'd just keep on going and going……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
She was so cute. 
While running, she always had such a big smile……Fufufu♪

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Her speed during the spurts was good, so maybe she's 
suited to being a Betweener. And her tenacity in the 
end to keep chasing was awesome, so it might fit her.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
She was able to catch her breath really quickly and seems 
to have a strong heart. She might become a good Stayer.
choice_data_list: You were paying close attention, huh?
You were paying close attention, huh?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
It's a habit…… Whenever I see a child, I can't help 
but think about what kind of running would suit her.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
That girl even said her 『Teacher』 was also 
a Stayer, so maybe she'll take the same path. 
Fufu, I'm looking forward to her growth!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Ah, well……I was talking about her mother. 
Sorry, out of habit, I ended up calling her a 『Teacher』
choice_data_list: What makes you call her that?
What makes you call her that?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Well, you see……

Cesario started walking, it looked like she was 
lost in thought. As I followed after her, we saw 
more Uma Musume children running around nearby.

It looked like the one looking after them 
was also an Uma Musume. Maybe it was some 
kind of kid's club that was active around here.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
A feeling of wanting to run, similar to instinct…… 
the power and strength they are born with―― 
Uma Musume have various things that humans do not.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Knowing how to handle those differences is very important. 
That can form the entire basis of your life as an Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
Cesario
text_block_list.text:
No matter what form it takes……it doesn't change the fact that 
Uma Musume who lead the next generations play an important role.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
That's why I call them 『Teachers』, a title 
filled with respect. Something that only another 
Uma Musume can do, an irreplaceable role.

Unexpectedly, I heard a very important story. 『Teacher』, 
such a simple word that carried a lot of meaning.

It wasn't just admiration. Like a jewel shining 
amongst stone, I had a clear perception. Put in 
to words, to her, a 『Teacher』 must be――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Actually……yes. Both of my parents work in fields related 
to raising Uma Musume, so since I was young, I've always 
seen what it's like for my mother to teach others.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
For those children that ran on impulse, my mother would 
guide them and help them discover what it meant to race……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
When I think about it, it was like that for me too. 
From my 『Teacher』 I inherited my run, and found the 
path I want to take……I learned how to truly run.
choice_data_list: You found your own path to run
You found your own path to run

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes. And like that, everyone, when guided by someone, can 
become whole. And the way that run is passed down, flowing 
like a river from one to the next, I find invaluable.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Since I was born an Uma Musume, I wanted to become 
a part of that flow. Guiding many Uma Musume 
as a 『Teacher』……or rather, 『A guiding light』――
choice_data_list: I think it really suits you

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
!! It suits me? Even from the perspective of a trainer? 
Waa…………! Fufu…………that makes me happy……!!

That she was this happy showed just how strong that 
admiration was. Even so, a 『Guiding Light』, huh? 
I asked something similar after the Selection race.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
And that's to become a guiding light for future Uma Musume―― 
Therefore, to prove my worth, I must win races.

So with those words she meant she wants to 
become a 『Teacher』 and guide many Uma Musume.

To become a great 『Teacher』, she wanted to obtain the Triple 
Tiara to help prove that. I could completely understand.

If I became her trainer, then I would want to help her. To do that, 
I would need to know more about Cesario's expectations――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
choice_data_list: I want to know more about it
I want to know more about it

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……understood. Then, tomorrow, let's meet at school.

My heart was beating faster, excited. Just like when the prologue 
was over and a story reached its climax in the second act.
